member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateStepBehavior
member.summary: Defines the possible behaviors of when a step different from 1 is defined for one of the selectable components of the structure.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateStepBehavior.MultiplesOnly
member.summary: All multiples of the current time step are shown in the looping selector.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateStepBehavior.BaseAndMultiples
member.summary: The base (starting) value and all multiples are shown in the looping selector.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateStepBehavior.StartFromBase
member.summary: Each value in the looping selector is generated by adding the step value to each previous value starting from the base value.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimeComponentType
member.summary: Defines the possible modifiable components of a date time item in a .

member.summary: The day part of the structure is considered.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimeComponentType.Month
member.summary: The month part of the structure is considered.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimeComponentType.Year
member.summary: The year part of the structure is considered.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimeComponentType.Hour
member.summary: The hour part of the structure is considered.

member.summary: The minute part of the structure is considered.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimeComponentType.Second
member.summary: The second part of the structure is considered.

member.name: F:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimeComponentType.AMPM
member.summary: The time span of a given value is considered.

member.name: T:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimeHelper

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimeHelper.IsAM(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets a boolean value that determines whether a given value is in the AM part of the day.
member.returns: True if in the AM part of the day, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimeHelper.Is24HourFormat(System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo)
member.summary: Returns a boolean value that determines whether a given implies 24 hour time format.
member.returns: True if the implies 24 hour time format, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimeHelper.Is24HourFormat(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a boolean value that determines whether a given time format string implies 24 hour time format.
member.returns: True if the string implies 24 hour time format, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimeHelper.Is24HourFormat
member.summary: Returns a boolean value that determines whether the default implies 24 hour time format.
member.returns: True if the default implies 24 hour time format, otherwise false.

member.summary: Gets a string representing the current culture's default long date pattern.

member.summary: Gets an integer representing the unique hour count according to the time format. This count can be either 12 or 24.

member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value determining whether the control is in read only mode. If set to true, the control does not allow the user to modify its value.

member.summary: Gets or sets the null text of the control. The null text is displayed when there is no value defined.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.EmptyContentTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the defining the visual appearance of the empty content of the control.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.DisplayValueFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a string representing the value format for the control. The value format determines how the edited value is displayed on the screen. If not set, the current culture is used.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.ValueString
member.summary: Gets the string representation of the current value. The string representation is the current value formatted according to the settings of the device and the control.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.MaxValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value of the value range for the control.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.MinValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum value of the value range for the control.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the date value.

member.name: E:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.Closed
member.summary: Fired when the selector part of the control has been closed.

member.name: E:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.Opened
member.summary: Fires when the selector part of the control has been opened.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.SelectorBackgroundStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance that defines the fill and border of the Selector part of the control. The Style should target the type.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.ItemLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the length (width and height) of the items that appear in the popup (selector) part of the picker.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.ItemSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical spacing among of the items that appear in the popup (selector) part of the picker.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.SelectorFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the selector format. This value defines how the different selector components will be ordered. By setting this property, you can also define which editable parts of the selector will be visible. For example setting 'y/m' will display the Year and Month components in a instance.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.IsOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value determining whether the selector part of the control is opened.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.SelectorDefaultValue
member.summary: Gets or sets an instance of the struct that represents the default value displayed in the picker popup. The default value is shown when the property is set to null.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.SelectorHeader
member.summary: Gets or sets the header displayed in the popup of this instance.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.SelectorHeaderTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets an instance of the class that represents the template used to visualise the content defined by the property.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.ItemCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of items visible within the popup (selector) part of the picker. This property is used to determine the height of the selector part when opened. The calculated height will not exceed the height of the current top-level Window. Pass non-positive value to stretch the selector vertically.

member.name: P:Telerik.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.DateTimePicker.DateTimeListsValue
member.summary: Gets the current DateTime value displayed by the Selector DateTime lists. Exposed for testing purposes.

member.summary: Determines whether the Selector Popup has been closed by its IsLightDismissEnabled routine or by a click over the OK/Cancel button. Exposed for testing purposes.
